entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 5.

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of rain except periods of wet snow over higher terrain. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 22 January 2023
